column1: station, they had proceeded to the Galle police station. At the time they went to
the Galle police station, two police officers of the Akmeemana police station had
been present. So was another person, whose connection to this case is unknown to
them. Having shown the accused to that other person, the two police officers had
inquired whether ‘is it them?’. To that inquiry, that person had responded in the
affirmative.  Thereafter,  the two police officers of the Akmeemana police station
had taken both accused to the Akmeemana police station.
